description:
It's a struggle to self-study anything, let alone a language! Languages were created for the sole purpose of communicating with others. So, is it possible to self-study Spanish online? Of course it is!

This course will help motivated self-studying Spanish students learn how to effectively learn online. Learn how to set achievable goals, how to identify the right resources and how to create a study plan that will lead you to success. Downloadable PDF documents help guide you through the entire process.

If you're at a loss on how to self-study Spanish online, have no fears! This course is designed to help you create your own learning plan.
title: How to Self-Study Spanish Online
